metadata.synopsis: Players arrive for the first time to the Orthon's lair where he lives. They're are gems on the orthon's bed that the player needs to exit the temple.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: So much blood... what the hells has been happening here?
0.context: NodeContext: Taken aback. Gith line: Pronounced 'Chk'. Guttural sounding, a gith version of "tsk".
